          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Nolli, C. (?): A kupidók eladása. 1762. In: Le pitture antiche d?Ercolano e contorni, vol. 3, plate 17. Nápoly, 1762. plate 7.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Nolli, C. (?): Selling of the Cupids. 1762. In: Le pitture antiche d?Ercolano e contorni, vol. 3, plate 17. Naples, 1762. plate 7..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nolli, C. (?): Verkaufen der Amoren. 1762. 
In: Le Pitture antiche d?Ercolano e contorni, Vol. 3, 
Platte 17. Neapel, 1762. Platte 7..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nolli, vente de C. (?) : des cupidons. 
1762. Dans : Contorni du d?Ercolano e d'antiche de 
Le pitture, vol. 3, plat 17. Naples, 1762. plat 7..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nolli, vender do C. (?): dos cupids. 1762. 
Em: Contorni do d?Ercolano e do antiche de Le pitture, 
vol. 3, placa 17. Nápoles, 1762. placa 7..</string>

1762. In: Contorni di d?Ercolano e del antiche del 
Le pitture, volume 3, piastra 17. Napoli, 1762. piastra 7..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Nolli, Γ. (?): πώληση του Cupids. 1762. Σε: Contorni LE πηττuρε antiche d?Ercolano
ε, εντάσεις 3, πιάτο 17, Νάπολη, 1762, πιάτο 7 ..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nolli, venta de la C. (?): de los cupids. 
1762. En: Contorni del d?Ercolano e del antiche de 
Le pitture, vol. 3, placa 17. Nápoles, 1762. placa 7..</string>
          </title>
